contents: I will start by moving to the right to align with the purple door, then I will instruct Agent1 to move to the right to be in the same row as the purple door. Once Agent1 is in position, I will instruct them to open the purple door using the purple key. Meanwhile, I will move around the wall to reach the door and get into position to pick up the box as soon as the door is open. After the door is open, I will move forward to check if the box is behind the door and pick it up to accomplish the mission.

To accomplish the mission, I will start by moving to the right to align with the purple door. Then, I will instruct Agent1 to move to the right to be in the same row as the purple door and open the purple door using the purple key. Meanwhile, I will move around the yellow ball by turning left and moving forward, then turning right to face the purple door and moving forward to reach it. Once the door is open, I will move forward to check if the box is behind the door and pick it up to accomplish the mission.

To accomplish the mission, I will start by moving forward to (4, 1), then turn right to face east, and then move forward to (5, 1), then move forward to (5, 2) to be in front of the purple locked door at (5, 3). Once I'm in position, I will use the 'open the door in forward' action to unlock the purple door using the purple key, allowing Agent0 to proceed. After opening the door, I will move forward and check if the box is behind it, and if so, I will pick it up, completing the mission. I will also communicate with Agent0 to further explore the area and find the box if it's not behind the door.
